title: Gabe
description: Gabe Brannigan is a Californian real estate mogul who is used to seeing property in terms of dollar signs. When his father dies unexpectedly and leaves him the family ranch, he’s annoyed rather than grateful. The conditions of his inheritance include living on the ranch for six months before being able to sell it.He’s ready to walk away from the deal until he meets the sexy, motorcycle-riding ranch caretaker. She’s brash and outspoken, rough around the edges. Definitely not his style, but that doesn’t stop him from wanting her. Craving her.Throwing all caution aside and deciding to have her.Josephine Ashby has found the perfect place to hide until Mr. Sexy Eyes shows up and announces he is moving in.A man who doesn’t believe in anything, finds himself believing in her.But will it be enough?
author: Ruth Cardello
